alert.note: Alert for Lincoln County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 28 at 1:03AM PST until March 02 at 12:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT PST WEDNESDAY NIGHT ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning above 3000 feet, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Lincoln County. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 4 PM this afternoon to midnight PST Wednesday night. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 4 AM PST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
